alr001.summary: 05/12/2022 - ALEX refactors MARCUS's prototype code for BizAI, discovering the original algorithm was fundamentally broken.

alr002.summary: 11:32PM - ALEX's pent-up rage about stolen equity explodes into physical violence against MARCUS.

asm031.summary: 11:30PM - ASHE witnesses MARCUS treat KAI like dirt.

asm042.summary: 03/20/2020 - MARCUS files frivolous defamation suit against ASHE, forcing settlement that includes non-disparagement clause.

det001.summary: 04/07/2022 - DEREK meets OLIVER and learns about Phsychotrophin.

det002.summary: 06/09/2022 - DEREK discovers that MARCUS stole and took credit for ALEX’s code at BizAI.

din002.summary: 05/02/2010 - DIANA negotiates with Stanford police to avoid arrests after first party gets raided.

fli002.summary: 5:30PM - FLIP overhears MARCUS  with a stranger. Something about ingesting the extracts being untested and dangerous.

fli003.summary: 11/11/2016 - FLIP discovers abandoned venue for the Naughty or Nice Party using B&E skills, impressing MARCUS

fli004.summary: 10:00PM - FLIP takes party drugs with DEREK to ease class anxiety while flirting with RACHEL

fli031.summary: 11/10/20 - FLIP asks MARCUS for a personal loan in exchange for a an undefined favor to be cashed in at an undefined time.

hos002.summary: 2:15AM- HOWIE watches the party descend into chaos, sees 40 years of Silicon Valley ideals die..

hos011.summary: 11/11/26 - HOWIE gives a lecture on his research on adaptive systems for collaboration.

jav003.summary:
04:18PM - JAMIE overhears a MYSTERIOUS STRANGER threaten MARCUS with lethal consequences if memory extraction protocol
fails

jav021.summary: 02:02AM - JAMIE witnesses MARCUS hand an envelope full of cash to MORGAN near the bar.

jav042.summary: 12:17AM - JAMIE witnesses VICTORIA offer MARCUS’ job to ALEX.

jaw011.summary: 4:36AM - Right before losing consciousness and memory, JAMES sees MARCUS entering a secret room adjoining the party space.

jek002.summary: 3:36AM- JESSICAH and SARAH have moment of truth about pregnancy, finding unexpected understanding.

jek031.summary: 9:20PM - HOWIE witnesses a heated exchange between JESSICAH and MARCUS.

kaa001.summary: 09/15/26 - KAI is ‘hired’ by MARCUS to do a ‘test install’. Payment is in the form of promise of future work.

kaa002.summary: 01:00AM - KAI searches desperately for ASHE after MARCUS dismissal as 'just a vendor’

kaa003.summary: ??/??/?? - KAI stays up all night yet again, trying to get the installation ready for another Marcus Blackwood party.

leb002.summary: 01/20/2027 - LEILA compiles proof MARCUS's 'proprietary' NeurAI memory indexing is her stolen from her work.

leb003.summary: 01:30AM - LEILA leverages code theft evidence to establish connection with VICTORIA

leb011.summary: 09/11/26 - MARCUS shows up in LEILA’s home, unannounced, and begs LEILA to sell him access to their private research on a new algorithm.

mab001.summary: ??/??/?? - MARCUS’ Memory extraction experiment notes indicate that MEMORIES are RETURNED to their OWNER if tokens are not processed before EXPIRATION.

mab002.summary: 07/15/2026 - MARCUS is contacted by a mysterious stranger soon after DEREK's brings a new party ‘favor’ to the scene. An opportunity to exploit his connections for profit.

mab003.summary: 03:52AM - MARCUS executes memory token locking protocol using drugged partygoers—outcome chaotic

mor021.summary: 8:32PM - MORGAN threatens MARCUS with testimony evidence unless MARCUS surrenders control of NeurAI.

mor042.summary: 11/30/2026 - Anonymous NeurAI employee sends MORGAN evidence of MARCUS's illegal memory experiments and drug use.

ols002.summary: 03/15/18 - OLIVER ends a venture with JAMES and LEILA to bury dangerous research. JAMES backs him. LEILA doesn't forgive.

ols011.summary: 08/22/26 - OLIVER’s human neural organoids research forges on after BLACKMAIL by MARCUS.

rat002.summary: 02/18/2025 - RACHEL meets DIANA to strategize SARAH's divorce; they combine shell company evidence with paternity test.

rat031.summary: 12:15AM - RACHEL tells SARAH about evidence confirming MARCUS’ criminal dealings with MORGAN’s energy clients.

sab001.summary: ??/??/?? - SARAH receives a personal offer from the BLACK MARKET to betray MARCUS.

sab002.summary: 09/20/2020 - SARAH submits resignation from Facebook to support MARCUS's BizAI launch.

ski001.summary: 09/13/25 - SKYLER draws up schema which could HYPOTHETICALLY be used to build the world’s first humanoid biological robot with functional intelligence.

ski002.summary: 09:15PM - MARCUS probes SKYLER about CyberLife's proprietary neural adaptation protocols

sof001.summary: 01/18/2026 - SOFIA becomes involved in secret negotiations over AI training rights on actor likenesses worth billions.

sof003.summary: 01/31/2027 - SOFIA's film research reveals NeurAI's AI claims are fraudulent

tac001.summary: 1:22am - TAYLOR drunkenly brags to HOWIE about getting ASHE fired from the Silicon Valley Business Journal

tac002.summary: 01/10/27 - TAYLOR witnesses MARCUS demand a world leader meeting from MORGAN. MARCUS invokes "the Ashe situation" to ensure silence.

vik001.summary: 02/15/2027 - VICTORIA and MORGAN meet to discuss a permanent solution to the MARCUS criminal liability problem.
